name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience in **AI**, **Full Stack Development**, and **Technical Leadership** specializing in the design and deployment of high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, I leverage modern frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** to build scalable applications. My expertise in **Azure** and **AWS** enhances cloud service deployment strategies.

I effectively utilize my problem-solving skills to structure complex data around fraud detection and e-commerce systems. My background in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, combined with CI/CD automation, ensures robust application development that adheres to compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Additionally, I have hands-on experience with **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, focusing on machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows. My strong communication skills, teamwork orientation, and curiosity foster an agile environment that promotes ownership and continuous improvement.

experience.responsibilities:
• Demonstrated **Technical Leadership** by architecting and developing scalable, full-stack healthcare and financial platforms using **TypeScript**, **Python (FastAPI)**, **Node.js**, and modern front-end frameworks including **React (17-18)**, **Next.js**, and **Vue (3.x)**, ensuring compliance with HIPAA, FHIR, GDPR, and financial regulatory standards (e.g., PCI DSS, SOX).
• Showcased **Problem Solving** capabilities by developing and deploying cross-platform mobile applications using **Flutter** and **React Native** for seamless user experiences across **iOS** and **Android**, integrating native modules with **Provider** and **Redux** for effective state management.
• Implemented **Deployment** strategies with mobile-specific CI/CD pipelines using **Fastlane** and **App Center**, completing automated testing, release management, and utilizing crash/error analytics tools such as **Firebase Crashlytics** and **Sentry**.
• Led the transformation of monolithic applications into microservices-based architectures employing **Docker**, **Kubernetes (AKS/EKS)**, and serverless frameworks like **AWS Lambda** and **Azure Functions**, enhancing high availability and fault tolerance.
• Designed and maintained a robust, cloud-native data architecture with **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, **Redis**, and **GraphQL**, optimizing for large-scale data ingestion, storage, and querying relevant to healthcare and financial data. 
• Developed machine learning models for patient risk prediction and fraud detection using **Python (scikit-learn, PyTorch, TensorFlow)**, with real-time inference services seamlessly integrated into backend solutions.
• Established MLOps pipelines utilizing **MLflow**, **DVC**, and **Apache Airflow** for continuous training, validation, versioning, and deployment of machine learning models across **development** and **production** environments.
• Integrated AI-based features in client-facing applications such as financial dashboards and health recommendations, leveraging trained models with APIs hosted on **Azure ML** and **AWS Sagemaker**.
• Spearheaded enterprise-level **DevOps** practices using **GitHub Actions**, **Azure DevOps**, and **CircleCI**, orchestrating security scans, testing, and multi-environment deployments for web and API services.
• Delivered advanced financial data visualization tools utilizing **D3.js**, **Chart.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, generating real-time insights into transaction trends, fraud detection, and operational KPIs.
• Collaborated with data scientists to embed **NLP models** (using **spaCy**, **Hugging Face Transformers**) into core services for healthcare document parsing and financial anomaly detection using RESTful APIs.
• Established comprehensive test strategies with **Jest**, **Cypress**, **PyTest**, and **Postman** covering unit, integration, E2E, and contract testing across front-end and backend services.
• Integrated **Azure Cognitive Search** and **ElasticSearch** to bolster advanced search functionality across millions of unstructured and structured health records and financial documents.

• Demonstrated technical leadership in the development and modernization of financial platforms, adopting a microservices-based architecture utilizing **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, resulting in a **30%** increase in system scalability and throughput for high-volume transaction processing.
• Spearheaded the creation of dynamic, user-focused front-end applications by implementing **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, leveraging **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to enhance user experience and improve load times by **25%**.
• Developed real-time transaction monitoring and analytics dashboards with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, allowing operations teams to track over **50,000** financial transactions daily, detect anomalies, and generate actionable insights swiftly.
• Integrated event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to facilitate asynchronous communication and real-time event processing for transactions, leading to a **40%** improvement in alert and compliance workflow responsiveness.
• Built and orchestrated ETL pipelines employing **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, achieving streamlined batch and real-time ingestion of financial data from over **10** internal and third-party sources.
• Pioneered AI/ML-powered fraud detection systems utilizing **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, successfully analyzing transaction patterns to proactively flag suspicious activities, reducing fraudulent activity by **15%**.
• Created ML pipelines for credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification deploying **MLflow** and **Airflow**, directly integrating model inference into backend services to facilitate real-time decision-making.

• Led **Technical Leadership** initiatives by designing and optimizing backend services for a global e-commerce platform utilizing **Python (FastAPI, Django)** and **Node.js (NestJS, Express)**, achieving **99.9% availability**, low latency, and scalability.
• Developed real-time features with **WebSockets** and event-driven architecture using **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, resulting in responsive order updates and dynamic inventory tracking for over **100,000** concurrent users.
• Demonstrated **Full Stack** capabilities by creating dynamic frontend applications leveraging **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, enriched with **TypeScript**, **Redux Toolkit**, and **Tailwind CSS** for a seamless user experience on web and mobile devices.
• Implemented advanced data management using **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra** ensuring fault-tolerant data access and enhancing performance across high-traffic e-commerce operations by **30%** through effective caching strategies.
• Spearheaded the integration of AI/ML algorithms utilizing **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow** to enhance product listings and search relevance, driving conversion rates up by **15%** based on real-time customer behavior analysis.
• Optimized application performance by integrating **Redis** caching for product metadata and shopping cart sessions, improving overall application responsiveness and cutting database read pressure by **40%**.
• Championed deployment strategies using **LaunchDarkly** for feature flags and **Kubernetes** namespaces for blue-green deployments, facilitating controlled rollouts and A/B testing for major updates.
• Executed the development of responsive, SEO-friendly e-commerce interfaces using **Next.js**, **Vue 3 + Nuxt**, and **HTML5/CSS3**, ensuring compliance with accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1) and enhancing mobile-first engagement.
• Created secure payment workflows using **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, implementing tokenized transactions and adhering to PCI compliance to safeguard sensitive customer data.
• Enforced strict security measures by applying **role-based access control (RBAC)** and **OAuth 2.0**, ensuring GDPR compliance and robust user data protection throughout the platform.
